summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3040 for the improvement of The Alley in Block Forty-nine (49), A. A. Denny's Addition (Bell & Denny's 3rd), being the alley between Third Avenue and Fourth Avenue, from Virginia Street to Lenora Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36599, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
